note.p: Memberships: Royal Academy of Sciences, Berlin; Imperial Academy of Sciences, St Petersburg (President)

Notes: According to his signature on Cert II, 189, he was "AUGUSTAE RUSSARUM IMPERATRICIS minoris Russiae Hetmannus, Camerarius ordinarius Legionis Praetorianae Ismailouicae Protribunus, Academicae Scientiarum Petropolitanae Praeses, Ordinum Equestrium et S Annae Eques, Regiae Societati Anglicanae et Academiae Scientiarum Regiae Berlinensi"
